overview:
Yaniv Bensadon, CEO FixYa

Yaniv Bensadon is a seasoned internet entrepreneur who over the past 8 years founded and led several successful consumer internet ventures. His recent venture, FixYa.com, is establishing itself as the first and largest crowd sourced tech support community for consumer products on the web. Bensadonâ€™s core expertise focuses on envisioning innovative solutions that accommodate the growing needs of online consumers, yet are holding an abundant economic potential for monetization.
